<question>
Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example
</question>

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width=10)
    wrapped_text = ""
    current_line = ""
    for word in split(text)
        if length(current_line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            wrapped_text *= current_line * "\n"
            current_line = ""
        end
        current_line *= word * " "
    end
    wrapped_text *= strip(current_line) # handle last line
    return wrapped_text
end
```

Example:
```julia
text = "This is a long string that we want to wrap"
println(wrap_string(text, 12))
```
Output:
```
This is a
long string
that we want
to wrap
```
